remarks: A subcategory is a category.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
statement:
subccat.1 $e |- D = ( C |`cat J ) $.
subccat.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( Subcat ` C ) ) $.
subccatid.1 $e |- ( ph -> J Fn ( S X. S ) ) $.
subccatid.2 $e |- .1. = ( Id ` C ) $.
subccatid $p |- ( ph -> ( D e. Cat /\ ( Id ` D ) = ( x e. S |-> ( .1. ` x ) ) ) ) $.
$d .1. x $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
$d J x $.
$d S x $.
$d ph x $.
